title: Solving Sudoku from images
text: I joined Kainos in July 2021 as a placement student, where I took part in their 7 week AI Academy. The culminating event of the programme was to plan, develop, and present an individual capstone project. I published a blog about the project on the Kainos website which you can find here.

title: Resources I like
text:
This list doesn’t contain resources which I’ve never used. It’s also not a list of every resource I’ve ever used.
This list isn’t in any particular order, and resources can appear multiple times under different headings.

title: About me
text:
I am a final year Computer Science student at Queen’s University Belfast with a strong interest in ML, data science, and MLOps.
During my time working as a Trainee ML Engineer at Kainos, I worked on multiple internal projects end-to-end, in areas such as supply chain optimisation, recommendation systems, and MLOps deployment/monitoring.
I am currently working on my final year project in the area of unsupervised semantic segmentation.


Trainee ML Engineer @ Kainos | July 2021 - July 2022
AI Research Internship @ QLab | July 2020 - June 2022



BEng Computer Science @ Queen’s University Belfast | Sep 2019 - Present
